specific_question: What were our annual software licensing costs in Q2 2024?
answer: Software licensing costs totaled $1.2 million with 15% allocated to CRM tools.
justification: Software licensing costs are not directly related to after-sales support quality.
dr_question: How can Elexion Automotive increase customer trust through after-sales support while balancing the need for exceptional customer care with efficient and cost-effective service?
